page.title: 10The World Today
page.content: The World is a lovely place full of things to do but bombs and things ruin it. Terrorists killing and kidnapping people. Men that grab children and kill them. Soon everyone will be too scared to go outside the door. Pickpockets are so bad takeing money out of old peoles pockets. If the world carries on like this the streets will soon be empty. This world has lovely forests and lots of animals too. The lakes, rivers and ponds full of little creatures. I'd like the world today if only the horrible people would go away. I like the cottages out in the country. The hooligans that go to football do not go for the game they go to cause trouble. I think that people should be seached before they go into a match for knives and drink. { by Johanne Wozencroft .
